item.description:
Don't call Me Shirley is going to Victorian Station Vic's Boathouse, let's go dance the night away and cheer them on in a new location, so get those dancing shoes on and dance baby dance, to a great group!!!

 

As the date gets closer we will be looking at getting a reservation for us all remember to check back for more information on this event!

 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can give your dues to either Donna or Janet at any event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will update this as we get closer to the date, please remember to check back!
item.name: Let's Dance, baby dance!!!
